description:
Isshiki approaches the Service Club with and interesting proposition, but Yukino would like to handle this time-sensitive challenge on her own.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Je n`ai jamais touché ce verrou jusqu`à aujourd`hui
Kyou made, Sono Kagi ni wa Ichido mo Fureta Koto ga Nai.
That Key Was Never Handled Until Today.
لم يمس هذا المفتاح مطلقًا قبل اليوم
今日まで, その鍵には一度も触れたことがない.
